headline: Should You Add Edwards Lifesciences Stock to Your Portfolio Now?
summary: EW gains traction with surgical tech and TAVR growth, but macro pressures and FX headwinds weigh on margins.

raw.headline: Should You Add Edwards Lifesciences Stock to Your Portfolio Now?
raw.summary: EW gains traction with surgical tech and TAVR growth, but macro pressures and FX headwinds weigh on margins.

headline: Edwards Lifesciences to Host Earnings Conference Call on July 24, 2025
summary: IRVINE, Calif., July 18, 2025--Edwards Lifesciences (NYSE: EW) plans to announce its operating results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025 after the market closes on Thursday July 24, 2025, and will host a conference call at 5:00 p.m. ET that day to discuss those results.
